name: PackfileError MissingMagicError WrongFileTypeError VersionTooOldError VersionTooNewError BlobDecodeError

display_html: type family EntropySize (n :: Nat) :: Nat where ...
name: EntropySize

display_html: type family MnemonicWords (n :: Nat) :: Nat where ...
name: MnemonicWords

display_html: type ValidEntropySize (n :: Nat) = (KnownNat n, NatWithinBound Int n, Elem n (96 ': (128 ': (160 ': (192 ': (224 ': (256 ': ([] :: [Nat]))))))))
name: ValidEntropySize

display_html: type ValidChecksumSize (ent :: Nat) (csz :: Nat) = (KnownNat csz, NatWithinBound Int csz, Elem csz (3 ': (4 ': (5 ': (6 ': (7 ': (8 ': ([] :: [Nat]))))))), CheckSumBits ent ~ csz)
name: ValidChecksumSize

display_html: type ConsistentEntropy (ent :: Nat) (mw :: Nat) (csz :: Nat) = (ValidEntropySize ent, ValidChecksumSize ent csz, ValidMnemonicSentence mw, MnemonicWords ent ~ mw)
name: ConsistentEntropy

display_html: type family CheckSumBits (n :: Nat) :: Nat where ...
name: CheckSumBits

display_html:
data MnemonicError csz
  • = ErrMnemonicWords MnemonicWordsError
  • | ErrEntropy (EntropyError csz)
  • | ErrDictionary DictionaryError
name: MnemonicError ErrMnemonicWords ErrEntropy ErrDictionary

display_html:
data EntropyError (csz :: Nat)
  • = ErrInvalidEntropyLength Int Int
  • | ErrInvalidEntropyChecksum (Checksum csz) (Checksum csz)
name: EntropyError ErrInvalidEntropyChecksum ErrInvalidEntropyLength

display_html: mkEntropy :: forall n csz. (ValidEntropySize n, ValidChecksumSize n csz) => ByteString -> Either (EntropyError csz) (Entropy n)
name: mkEntropy

display_html: mkMnemonic :: forall mw n csz. (ConsistentEntropy n mw csz, EntropySize mw ~ n) => [Text] -> Either (MnemonicError csz) (Mnemonic mw)
name: mkMnemonic

display_html: genEntropy :: forall n csz. (ValidEntropySize n, ValidChecksumSize n csz) => IO (Entropy n)
name: genEntropy

display_html: entropyToMnemonic :: forall mw n csz. (ValidMnemonicSentence mw, ValidEntropySize n, ValidChecksumSize n csz, n ~ EntropySize mw, mw ~ MnemonicWords n) => Entropy n -> Mnemonic mw
name: entropyToMnemonic

  • submitTx :: WalletId -> (Tx, TxMeta, [TxWitness]) -> ExceptT ErrSubmitTx IO ()
  • attachPrivateKey :: WalletId -> (Key RootK XPrv, Passphrase "encryption") -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet IO ()
}
